definitions: in a way that relates to drama or the performance of drama

examples.text: they displayed their talents both musically and dramatically
dramatically and technically the film falls far short

shortDefinitions: in way that relates to drama or the performance of drama

definitions: by a strikingly large amount or to a strikingly large extent; greatly

examples.text: my opponent's policies are dramatically different from ours

shortDefinitions: by strikingly large amount or to strikingly large extent

definitions: in an exciting or impressive manner

examples.text: his dramatically shaped canvases attracted critical acclaim

definitions: in a way intended to create an effect; theatrically
shortDefinitions: in way intended to create effect
